flawed_nl_solution:
He can lift 135+265=<<135+265=400>>400 pound without the bracer
The bracer adds 400*6=<<400*6=4200>>4200 pounds
So he can now squat 4200+400=<<4200+400=4600>>4600 pounds
#### 4600

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 2400, not 4200. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
